name: Honey Sun Dried Roasted Coffee Beans
description: Let The Honey Sun Dried coffee beguile you. For this fragrant offering, cherries are pulped and sun-dried with a thick layer of mucilage to ensure sweet and fruity flavours with every sip. Origin - Baarbara, Chikmagalur, Karnataka Altitude - 4500 ft - 5000 ft Varietal - SLN 795 Roasted for - Espresso Recommended Brewing Equipment - Aeropress, Iced Coffee Taste Notes - Cherry, Orange Rind
